EmailTemplate.name: DataArchiva : Metadata Resynchronization Failed
EmailTemplate.subject: Metadata resynchronization failed in Data Archiva.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear **name**,
This is a system generated mail from Salesforce DataArchiva application. It was found that object schema was changed in recent time and metadata resynchronization service was unable to fix the issue automatically. Due to which, data archiving of a configured object got failed and details are given below. Please rectify the issue and re-run the archive to re-process. In case if you're unable to figure out the root cause and require help, please contact support@dataarchiva.com with this mail attached. support@dataarchiva.com with this mail attached.
Organization ID : **OrgId**
Object Name : **object**
Date : **Date and time**
Failure cause : **Message**
Thanks, DataArchiva System
